member.name: IMFSampleAllocatorControl.GetAllocatorUsage
member.summary: Retrieves the sample allocator usage for the specified output stream.
member.param: The ID of the output stream whose sample allocator usage is requested.
If the allocator usage is , then this output parameter is set to the ID of the input stream that the output samples are coming from. For all other allocator usage values, this parameter is ignored.
A member of the enumeration specifying the sample allocator usage of the specified output stream.

member.name: IMFSampleAllocatorControl.SetDefaultAllocator
member.summary: Sets the default sample allocator to use for the specified output stream.
member.param: The ID of the output stream that the pAllocator parameter applies to.
Receives a pointer to a sample allocator to use for the specified output stream. The allocator supports one of the MF allocator interfaces, such as or .

member.name: IMFSampleAllocatorControl
member.summary: Implemented by video capture sources and transforms. Allows the system to provide components with a sample allocator to allocate samples using memory that is accessible from within a container.
